item.description:
Come join us for a evening of wine, music and food at Chamard Winery in Clinton CT. Bring you favorite Appetizer to share with the group and enjoy the Country blue sound of singer Joe Flood as we sip the night away with delectable wine. This event is held from 5 to 8 oclock on Sat. April 3 2010. Wine tasting is just $5.00 and a glass of there speciality wine selection ranges from $5.00 to $8.00 a glass. If enough people are interested we can also take a wine tour around the vineyard for $10.00 a person. Let me know your thoughts on the tour and I can call ahead and reserve a time.

"Bon Appetit" Denise
Charmard Vineyard
115 Cow Hill Rd.
Clinton, CT 06413
860 664 0299

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Chamard Wine Tasting, Music and Appetizer Event
